name: Onegameamonth
body:
# One Game A Month Repo
This will be my repo for my #onegameamonth games. They will all either be html or generated html from Construct 2.
tagline: Collection of games created monthly for the #onegameamonth challenge. See http://www.onegameamonth.com/
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
